Requirements: Android 2.2+
Overview: The global standard for reliably viewing and sharing PDF documents

AdobeÃ‚Â® ReaderÃ‚Â® is the free, trusted leader for reliably viewing and interacting with PDF documents across platforms and devices. Install the free Adobe Reader mobile app to work with PDF files on your Android smartphones and tablets. Easily access, manage, and share a wide variety of PDF file types, including PDF Portfolios, password-protected documents, fillable forms, and Adobe LiveCycleÃ‚Â® rights-managed PDF files.

View and share PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly open PDF files on your Android device
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ View PDF Portfolios, password-protected PDF files, annotations, and drawing markups
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search text to find specific information
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Select single page or continuous scroll modes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily zoom in on text or images for a closer view
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Email PDF files as attachments and share files with other applications

Navigate through PDF content
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use bookmarks to jump directly to a section in your PDF file
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly navigate through large files using thumbnails
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap on links in PDF files to open linked web pages

Annotate and comment on PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Provide feedback using the highlight, strikethrough, and underline tools
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily mark up PDF content with the freehand drawing tool
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add comments anywhere in your PDF file with sticky notes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add text with the Add Text tool

Fill out forms
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly fill out simple PDF forms
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Have confidence that the form is correct with our new field validation
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Save, sign, and forward forms to others

Organize your documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create folders to make organizing and finding documents easier
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make copies of files to mark up or to use as templates
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Rename files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily select and delete multiple files

Electronically sign documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the new Ink Signature tool to sign any document using your finger
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Send PDF files to others for electronic signing by connecting to Adobe EchoSign

Available languages:
English, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Czech, Danish, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, and Turkish
